SLEEP OF 7-8 HOURS IS RECOMMENDED!
Orange Juice + 2 boiled eggs whites. Vegans can have an apple instead of egg whites.
Cabbage soup made with lots of veggies such as tomato, broccoli, cabbage, onion, garlic, spinach, and carrots. You can also have 2 Chapati with Daal (Pulses). You can have some fruits after lunch.
Baked fish/Boiled chicken breast. Vegans can have Paneer/ grilled tofu and veggies.
6 eggs + 1 cup oatmeal + fresh orange juice
Boiled chicken breast with veggies + 3 chapati made of whole grain. You can have some fruits after lunch.
Boiled chicken breast with 1 cup brown rice and 1 cup beans
Milk (1 Glass) + 1 banana with bread with butter / Parantha / Omelet.
4 whole grain chapati with any vegetable with curd. You can have some fruits after lunch.
2 whole grain chapati with 2 cup rice + 1 cup daal (Pulses).
